title: Can we have an almost permanent wall being created by any mean ?
body:
I'd like a to see a way to created almost permanent wall in the game , we have champions  {{champion:427}} that creates long lasting bushes, champion {{champion:83}} that creates long lasting minions, champion {{champion:268}} creating long lasting turret.

how it comes we don't have any champion that create long lasting walls ? (i'n not talking about being trapped , you can always address that issue with a long enough cast time)

i'd like to see a champion that create a safe area for drakes , stops enemy ganks, block certain jungle path
maybe bock his own minions to throw them to the opponent's turret's after 2 minutes or so

replies.body: i thought taliyah and anivia already did
5 sec isn't permanent and taliyah only has 1 wall :(

ah.
thing is, you can break the game with it.

Permanent wall as in **completely blocking the enemy's mid lane & forces minions to go around jungle to do so?**

See how dumb this abusal sounds?

permanent as if you don't do anything (destroying the wall)
the wall remain,
kinda like a longer yorick wall that is not a circle

> [{quoted}](name=The Anivia OTP,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E5Xi1yVT,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-11-13T08:30:51.168+0000)
>
> permanent as if you don't do anything (destroying the wall)
> the wall remain,
> kinda like a longer yorick wall that is not a circle

So....an ordinary Anivia wall?

anivia wall = 5 secs

wall i'm talking about = 60 sec or 3 hits

a long lasting yorick E

>i'd like to see a champion that create a safe area for drakes , stops enemy ganks, block certain jungle path

{{champion:34}} and {{champion:48}} have great tools for this.

A permanent wall would be a little to much, IMO. That's either going to mean the enemy has to burn Flash, have a dash (which makes immobile champions weaker), or play around it which just really isn't that healthy.
Because this would be a heavy troll and provides too much of a win condition in most cases. You probably could accomplish something similar with some group effort, but nothing for certain.

> how it comes we don't have any champion that create long lasting walls

... because not every champion has a dash? 

{{champion:163}} 's wall is as good as it will get.

Well lore-wise it would make sense for anivia`s W to last a long time since its true ice I think?

But I feel like you were leading to that considering your username.


A long lasting wall would be really hard to balance, and just plain abusive against immobile champs.
